part.content: PART I : THE PERSONS BY WHOM MARRIAGES MAY BE SOLEMNIZED. Sec. 4 - 9.
PART II : TIME AND PLACE AT WHICH MARRIAGES MAY BE SOLEMNIZED. Sec. 10 - 11.
PART III : MARRIAGES SOLEMNIZED BY MINISTERS OF RELIGION LICENSED UNDER THIS ACT. Sec. 12 - 26.
PART IV : REGISTRATION OF MARRIAGES SOLEMNIZED BY MINISTERS OF RELIGION. Sec. 27 - 37.
PART V : MARRIAGES SOLEMNIZED BY, OR IN THE PRESENCE OF, A MARRIAGE REGISTRAR. Sec. 38 - 59.
PART VI : MARRIAGE OF INDIAN CHRISTIANS. Sec. 60 - 65.
